Question: Chengdu Aplux Intelligence Technology Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Chengdu Aplux Intelligence Technology Ltd.

Product: Fusion Architecture AI Tool Chain

- Operating system fusion: Android/Harmony OS + Linux
- AI Tool Chain for accelerating AI applications
- AIoT Application Development and Deployment Platform
- AI Model Optimizer for AI application development
- Industrial Inspection solution based on ARM Robot
- Single arm baseboard for Human Computer Interaction
- AI Education for developing AI applications
- Certified developer community for AI application implementation
